title: New: Moss Kena – These Walls (Kendrick Lamar)
body:
Taking on anything from 2015’s best album is pretty ambitious; not to mention doing it on your debut offering.

**Moss Kena’s** twist on Kendrick Lamar’s _These Walls_ is funky, respectful, upbeat and hopefully, the sign of much much more to come. Colour me excited. Check it out below.

Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
